item.description:
Let me preface this by saying, I am not familiar with the trails- I have a map and I can follow directions- but if someone else is familiar you may make a suggestion... I liked Gary's Hike which I was unfortunately unable to attend- so if I don't hear from anyone I will follow this one...

State park on Poole Rd. Hike the Parker trail over to the Cliff Walk Trail follow over to Bald Rock the across Amphitheatre tr. to White Arrow.
Return down the Pumpelli trail to the Red Dot to Cascade link to White Dot trail back to State park. We'll stop over at Inspiration Point, a little known spot with an exceptional view of Bald Rock.
This is not a beginners hike! Very steep sections lots of exposed ledges.


I will be in the parking lot at 9am, dark blue VW Beetle-

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Mt Monadnock-Last Minute
